title: Paris-Roubaix Quick Guide: Ranking the Favorites, Rating the Cobbles, Timings for a Sunday in ‘Hell’
content:
Everything you need to know for Paris-Roubaix and the cobblestone bust-up with Pogačar, Van der Poel, Pedersen, Van Aert.

Read the full article at Paris-Roubaix Quick Guide: Ranking the Favorites, Rating the Cobbles, Timings for a Sunday in ‘Hell’ on Velo.
